nodes.text: That's hardly half a meter off the floor! This is going to be a cinch!
That rope looks like it's hardly half a meter off the floor, but when you're on it, it feels like you're ten meters up!
Suppertime is coming soon and it's too late to practice right now.
I am not going to waste my precious sleeping time exercising!
I like to live a balanced life. Like not spending too much time practicing a single skill.
There's only so much "landing on my butt" that I can take in one day.
That's more than enough balancing on the edge of a rope for one day.
Sure, and I'll take the stairs and the sandpit, too, and just set them all up in my dormroom.
It's a walk in the park!
Can't everyone do this?
Ho-hum... I think I'll go for a stroll!
And away we go!
Oh, is this where I'm supposed to fall? I think not!
Just call me the daring young man on the... on the... tightrope.
The secret is to be me!
I think... I think I can do it!
Better not make this look too easy!
It's like... WOAH! ... like second nature!
I've got this tota... whoAAhwooAAH!... totally under control!
C'mon, Shawn, you can do this... eaaaasy does it...
... baby steps... baby steps...
... center of gravity low... keep it over the rope... that's the way...

nodes.message: Play sound effect of Shawn falling

nodes.text: Ow! I definitely need more practice!
Ouch! The suspension is killing me!
Oof! Someone could hurt themself falling off this thing!
Argh! The tightrope-walking is bad enough, but sticking the landing is impossible!
Ow! Is this what they mean by "go pound sand"?
Oof! Stupid skinny, wobbly rope!
Argh! Look what you made me do!
